import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import blogpost from '../../data/blog.json'; class Canvas extends Component { render() { return (

Recent Posts

    {blogpost.slice(0, 3).map((item, i) => (
  • {item.title}
    {item.postdate}
    • ))}

Contact Us

  • 305 Royal Track Suite 019, USA
  • +10910-910920
  • example@example.com

Follow Us

 ); } } export default Canvas;
